description: Provides a DigitalOcean DNS record resource.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Domain.description: The domain to add the record to.

Flags.description: The flags of the record. Only valid when type is `CAA`. Must be between 0 and 255.

Name.description: The hostname of the record. Use `@` for records on domain's name itself.

Port.description: The port of the record. Only valid when type is `SRV`.  Must be between 1 and 65535.

Priority.description: The priority of the record. Only valid when type is `MX` or `SRV`. Must be between 0 and 65535.

Tag.description: The tag of the record. Only valid when type is `CAA`. Must be one of `issue`, `issuewild`, or `iodef`.

Ttl.description: The time to live for the record, in seconds. Must be at least 0.

Type.description: The type of record. Must be one of `A`, `AAAA`, `CAA`, `CNAME`, `MX`, `NS`, `TXT`, or `SRV`.

Weight.description: The weight of the record. Only valid when type is `SRV`.  Must be between 0 and 65535.
